CN.content:

These are the specific terms used to describe the properties of the material Bithiophene-3,3, which is a promising building block in n-type polymers.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph:

2. BTI (Bithiophene-3,3)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to the material name "Bithiophene-3,3".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to "Material Name" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":
